summary.para: Set additional flags that will be included in the call to .

param.name: dwCreationFlags
param.para: The flags that will be included in the dwCreationFlags parameter passed to .

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Any creation flags that were previously set will remain set. This method does not clear any creation flags.

summary.para: Additional flags that will be included in the structure passed to .

param.name: dwStartupInfoFlags
param.para: The flags that will be included in the dwFlags member of the structure passed to .

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Any creation flags that were previously set will remain set. This method does not clear any creation flags.

summary.para: Gets the additional flags that will be passed to .

param.name: pdwCreationFlags
param.para: A pointer to a DWORD which receives the flags that will be passed as the dwCreationFlags parameter to .

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Set the flags that will be included in the call to .

param.name: dwCreationFlags
param.para: The flags that will be passed to the dwCreationFlags parameter to .

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Any flags set by a previous call to or SetCreateFlags will be replaced by the values specified by dwCreationFlags. Use AddCreateFlags to set flags without clearing flags that are already set.

summary.para: Sets a variable in the environment of the created process.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A null-terminated string specifying the name of a variable to be set in the environment of the process to be created. This parameter may not be NULL.

param.name: pszValue
param.para: A null-terminated string specifying the value of the variable to be set in the environment of the process to be created. his parameter may not be NULL.

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: If a variable with the same name already exists in the environment of the created process, it is replaced.

summary.para: Sets the hot key for the application.

param.name: wHotKey
param.para: The hotkey to assign to the application. See the documentation of the hStdIn member of the structure for more information.

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method also sets the STARTF_USEHOTKEY flag in the dwFlags member of the structure passed to .

summary.para: Sets the title that will be passed .

param.name: pszTitle
param.para: A null-terminated string specifying the title that will be passed in the lpTitle member of the structure passed to . This parameter may not be NULL.

returns.para: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Used by the interface to alter some parameters of the process that is being created.

remarks.para: Applications do not implement this interface.
A pointer to this interface is passed to .
